name: Webtye Solutions
description:
Webtye is a full stack software development company specializing in custom software solution and advanced web and mobile development sased in the heart of New York. Webtye has acquired Fortune 500 companies as clients providing them with a excellent customer experience in the city. 
 
Over the last decade, we have invested our talent and time working with the best thinkers in the business to create products and technologies that are shaping today's world. We formed deep partnerships with an amazing collection of individuals and brands to collaboratively weave design and technology and create the best user experiences in the world.
Our price point advantage is usually why we have acquired a lot of our clients. Our hourly rate is between $28 - $60. Mainly, only the high end technologies are geared towards the higher rate. Feel free to reach us anytime at 646-668-5677 to discuss how you can take advantage of our services.
